item.title: nadal cruises into french open semi-finals as soderling routed
item.description: rafa nadal cranked up his bid for a record-equaling sixth french open title by routing his nemesis robin soderling 6-4 6-1 7-6 wednesday to power into the semi-finals.

item.description: the greek prime minister is considering reshuffling his cabinet to include officials suggested by the opposition if it backs his austerity policies, kathimerini daily wrote without naming sources.
